history.content: No, you can't guarantee getting back on the waitlist. (Speaking from personal experience with this same situation...)

Since I am waitlisted in a class and there are discussion sections with smaller waitlists, I would like to drop the class and re-add myself to the easier-to-get-into discussions.  

Before I do this, does anyone know if the drops/adds get processed instantaneously?  Will I essentially be guaranteed to get back onto the waitlist if I quickly re-add?

(This question arises b/c one cannot swap discussion sections if you are on the waitlist.)

Update: I decided to take the risk anyway, and I got back into the class in the better section.
history.subject: Dropping Waitlist and Re-Adding
